shortdesc.ph: Gets the call ID using the connection ID.
Get the call ID using the connection ID.
Gets the call ID using the connection ID.
Gets the call ID using the connection ID.

p.codeblock: public abstract int GetCallIdEx(ref string callId, RtcConnection connection);

section.p: Each time the client joins a channel, a corresponding callId is generated to identify the call session. You can call this method to get the callId and then pass it to methods such as and .
Each time the client joins a channel, a corresponding callId is generated to identify the call session. You can call this method to obtain the callId parameter, then pass it to methods like and .

Each time the client joins a channel, a corresponding callId is generated to identify the current call. You can call this method to get the callId parameter, and then pass it in when calling methods such as and .

Each time the client joins a channel, it generates a corresponding callId to identify the current call. You can call this method to get the callId parameter, and then pass it in when calling methods such as and .

section.title: Timing
section.p: This method must be called after joining a channel.
This method must be called after joining a channel.
This method must be called after joining a channel.
You need to call this method after joining a channel.

plentry.pd: An output parameter. The current call ID.
